ElementType.name: ajaxListener
ElementType.description:
This works the same as ActionListener or ValueChangeListener, but for an AJAX container. Add the specified class
as a listener for AjaxEvent (sent in case of an AJAX request
for this container).

AttributeType.name: type
AttributeType.description: Fully qualified Java class name of an AjaxListener to be created and registered.

ElementType.name: keepAlive
ElementType.description:
This tag get bean by EL expression '#{'+name+'}' and store bean instance in component tree. After restoring view state, bean is putted to request-scope attributes with name.
Since, every view will be use own instance of bean for expressions '#{name....}'

AttributeType.name: beanName
AttributeType.description: name of bean for EL-expressions.

AttributeType.name: ajaxOnly
AttributeType.description: if true, bean value restored in ajax requests only.

ElementType.name: actionparam
ElementType.description: A combination of the functionality of two JSF tags, <f:actionListener>; and <f:param>. At the render phase, it's decoded by parent component (<h:commandLink>; or like) as usual. <br /> At the process request phase, if the parent component performs an action event, update the value specified in the "assignTo" attribute as its value. <br /> If a converter attribute is specified, use it to encode and decode the value to a string stored in the html parameter. <br />

AttributeType.name: assignTo
AttributeType.description: EL expression for updatable bean property. This property will be updated if the parent command component performs an actionEvent.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: converter
AttributeType.description: ID of a converter to be used or a reference to a converter.

AttributeType.name: name
AttributeType.description: A name of this parameter

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: An initial value or a value binding

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: noEscape
AttributeType.description: If set to true, the value will not enclosed within single quotes and there will be no escaping of characters. This allows the use of the value as JavaScript code for calculating value on the client-side. This doesn't work with non-AJAX components.

ElementType.name: commandButton
ElementType.description: Renders an HTML "input" element. <br /> During Decoding: Obtains the Map from the "requestParameterMap" property of the ExternalContext. If the value in the Map for the value of the "clientId" property of the component is not null, create a javax.faces.event.ActionEvent around the component, and pass it to the queueEvent() method of the component. If the request is Ajax-performed, add its target IDs of the reRender property to the rendered areas list of the nesting AjaxContainer. <br /> During Encoding: Builds an AJAX.Submit JavaScript call for the "onclick" event. Renders the clientId of the component as the value of the "name" attribute. Renders the current value of the component as the value of the "value" attribute. If the "styleClass" attribute is specified, render its value as the value of the "class" attribute. Renders child components inside the HTML "input" element.

AttributeType.name: actionListener
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

AttributeType.name: reRender
AttributeType.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: ajaxSingle
AttributeType.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

AttributeType.name: data
AttributeType.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

AttributeType.name: eventsQueue
AttributeType.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

AttributeType.name: type
AttributeType.description: submit|reset|image|button This attribute specifies a type of control to create. The default value for this attribute is "submit"

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

AttributeType.name: accesskey
AttributeType.description: This attribute assigns an access key to an element. An access key is a single character from the document character set. Note: Authors should consider the input method of the expected reader when specifying an accesskey

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

AttributeType.name: alt
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component.

AttributeType.name: onblur
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; the element lost the focus

AttributeType.name: onmouseup
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: The current value for this component

AttributeType.name: action
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

AttributeType.name: focus
AttributeType.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: requestDelay
AttributeType.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

AttributeType.name: onmousemove
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

AttributeType.name: ignoreDupResponses
AttributeType.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event.

AttributeType.name: ondblclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

AttributeType.name: status
AttributeType.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

AttributeType.name: onmouseout
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

AttributeType.name: oncomplete
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: bypassUpdates
AttributeType.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

AttributeType.name: tabindex
AttributeType.description: This attribute specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767. User agents should ignore leading zeros

AttributeType.name: image
AttributeType.description: Absolute or relative URL of the image to be displayed for this button. If specified, this "input" element will be of type "image". Otherwise, it will be of the type specified by the "type" property with a label specified by the "value" property.

AttributeType.name: onkeyup
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

AttributeType.name: onfocus
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; the element got the focus

AttributeType.name: onkeydown
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

AttributeType.name: onkeypress
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: onchange
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; the element value was changed

AttributeType.name: onmouseover
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

AttributeType.name: size
AttributeType.description: This attribute tells the user agent the initial width of the control. The width is given in pixels except when type attribute has the value "text" or "password". In that case, its value refers to the (integer) number of characters

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

AttributeType.name: limitToList
AttributeType.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: onclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

AttributeType.name: onmousedown
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

AttributeType.name: timeout
AttributeType.description: Timeout ( in ms ) for request.

AttributeType.name: disabled
AttributeType.description: When set for a form control, this boolean attribute disables the control for user input.

ElementType.name: commandLink
ElementType.description: Renders an HTML "a" anchor element that acts like a form submit button when clicked. <br /> During Decoding: Obtains the Map from the "requestParameterMap" property of the ExternalContext. If this Map contains non null value for the "clientId" key, creates a javax.faces.event.ActionEvent around the component and passes it to the queueEvent() method of the component. If the request is Ajax-performed, adds its target IDs from the reRender property to the rendered areas list of the nesting AjaxContainer. <br /> element for decoding as described above with the parameters of the component. (PARAM_NAME and PARAM_VALUE are the names and values, respectively, of any nested UIParameter children.) The name and the value must be URLEncoded. If the "styleClass" attribute is specified, render its value as the value of the "class" attribute. Render any non-UIParameter children as normal inside of the "a" element. These will appear as the link text.

AttributeType.name: actionListener
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

AttributeType.name: reRender
AttributeType.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: rev
AttributeType.description: A reverse link from the anchor specified by this hyperlink to the current document. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

AttributeType.name: ajaxSingle
AttributeType.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

AttributeType.name: data
AttributeType.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

AttributeType.name: eventsQueue
AttributeType.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

AttributeType.name: type
AttributeType.description: The content type of the resource designated by this hyperlink

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

AttributeType.name: accesskey
AttributeType.description: This attribute assigns an access key to an element. An access key is a single character from the document character set. Note: Authors should consider the input method of the expected reader when specifying an accesskey

AttributeType.name: hreflang
AttributeType.description: Base language of a resource specified with the href attribute; hreflang may only be used with href

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

AttributeType.name: onblur
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code. The onblur event occurs when an element loses focus either by the pointing device or by tabbing navigation. It may be used with the same elements as onfocus

AttributeType.name: onmouseup
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: The current value for this component

AttributeType.name: action
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

AttributeType.name: focus
AttributeType.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: requestDelay
AttributeType.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

AttributeType.name: onmousemove
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

AttributeType.name: ignoreDupResponses
AttributeType.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event.

AttributeType.name: ondblclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

AttributeType.name: status
AttributeType.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

AttributeType.name: onmouseout
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

AttributeType.name: oncomplete
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: bypassUpdates
AttributeType.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

AttributeType.name: tabindex
AttributeType.description: This attribute specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767. User agents should ignore leading zeros

AttributeType.name: onkeyup
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

AttributeType.name: charset
AttributeType.description: The character encoding of a resource designated by this hyperlink

AttributeType.name: onfocus
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code. The onfocus event occurs when an element gets focus.

AttributeType.name: onkeypress
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

AttributeType.name: onkeydown
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

AttributeType.name: shape
AttributeType.description:
default|rect|circle|poly [CI] This attribute specifies the shape of a region. Possible values:
* default: Specifies the entire region. * rect: Define a rectangular region. * circle: Define a circular region. * poly: Define a polygonal region.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: onmouseover
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

AttributeType.name: coords
AttributeType.description:
This attribute specifies the position and shape on the screen. The number and order of values depends on the shape being defined. Possible combinations:
* rect: left-x, top-y, right-x, bottom-y. * circle: center-x, center-y, radius. Note. When the radius value is percentage value, user agents should calculate the final radius value based on the associated object's width and height. The radius should be the smaller value of the two. * poly: x1, y1, x2, y2, ..., xN, yN. The first x and y coordinate pair and the last should be the same to close the polygon. When these coordinate values are not the same, user agents should infer an additional coordinate pair to close the polygon.
Coordinates are relative to the top, left corner of the object. All values are lengths. All values are separated by commas

AttributeType.name: limitToList
AttributeType.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

AttributeType.name: target
AttributeType.description:
This attribute specifies the name of a frame where a document is to be opened.
By assigning a name to a frame via the name attribute, authors can refer to it as the "target" of links defined by other elements

AttributeType.name: onclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: onmousedown
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

AttributeType.name: rel
AttributeType.description: The relationship from the current document to the anchor specified by this hyperlink. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

AttributeType.name: timeout
AttributeType.description: Timeout ( in ms ) for request.

ElementType.name: form
ElementType.description: Ajax-related version of html form. Main difference with original component - all hidden fields, nessesary to command links alwais rendered, not depended of rendering links on initial page.

AttributeType.name: ignoreDupResponses
AttributeType.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event.

AttributeType.name: reRender
AttributeType.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: status
AttributeType.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

AttributeType.name: accept
AttributeType.description: This attribute specifies a comma-separated list of content types that a server processing this form will handle correctly. User agents may use this information to filter out non-conforming files when prompting a user to select files to be sent to the server (cf. the INPUT element when type="file")

AttributeType.name: ajaxSingle
AttributeType.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

AttributeType.name: submitted
AttributeType.description: submitted

AttributeType.name: data
AttributeType.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

AttributeType.name: oncomplete
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: bypassUpdates
AttributeType.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

AttributeType.name: ajaxSubmit
AttributeType.description: If true, it becomes possible to set AJAX submission way for any components inside .

AttributeType.name: eventsQueue
AttributeType.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: onsubmit
AttributeType.description: The onsubmit event occurs when a form is submitted. It only applies to the FORM element

AttributeType.name: onreset
AttributeType.description: The onreset event occurs when a form is reset. It only applies to the FORM element

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: acceptCharset
AttributeType.description:
This attribute specifies the list of character encodings for input data that is accepted by the server processing this form. The value is a space- and/or comma-delimited list of charset values. The client must interpret this list as an exclusive-or list, i.e., the server is able to accept any single character encoding per entity received.
The default value for this attribute is the reserved string "UNKNOWN". User agents may interpret this value as the character encoding that was used to transmit the document containing this FORM element

AttributeType.name: enctype
AttributeType.description: This attribute specifies the content type used to submit the form to the server (when the value of method is "post"). The default value for this attribute is "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". The value "multipart/form-data" should be used in combination with the INPUT element, type="file"

AttributeType.name: limitToList
AttributeType.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

AttributeType.name: target
AttributeType.description:
This attribute specifies the name of a frame where a document is to be opened.
By assigning a name to a frame via the name attribute, authors can refer to it as the "target" of links defined by other elements

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: focus
AttributeType.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: timeout
AttributeType.description: Timeout ( in ms ) for request.

AttributeType.name: requestDelay
AttributeType.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

ElementType.name: htmlCommandLink
ElementType.description: Ajax-related version of html commandLink. Single difference with original component - all hidden fields, nessesary to command links alwais rendered, not depended of rendering links on initial page.

AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

This attribute specifies the position and shape on the screen. The number and order of values depends on the shape being defined. Possible combinations:
* rect: left-x, top-y, right-x, bottom-y. * circle: center-x, center-y, radius. Note. When the radius value is percentage value, user agents should calculate the final radius value based on the associated object's width and height. When these coordinate values are not the same, user agents should infer an additional coordinate pair to close the polygon.
Coordinates are relative to the top, left corner of the object. All values are lengths. All values are separated by commas

AttributeType.name: rendered

AttributeType.name: eventsQueue
AttributeType.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

AttributeType.name: name
AttributeType.description: Name of generated JavaScript function definition

AttributeType.name: limitToList
AttributeType.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

AttributeType.name: action
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: focus
AttributeType.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: timeout
AttributeType.description: response waiting time on a particular request. If a response is not received during this time, the request is aborted

AttributeType.name: requestDelay
AttributeType.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

ElementType.name: include
ElementType.description: include content of external view. Navigation cases in included file change only viewId of included page, and don't perform navigation in root view.

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

AttributeType.name: ajaxRendered
AttributeType.description: ajaxRendered

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

AttributeType.name: keepTransient
AttributeType.description: keepTransient

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

AttributeType.name: layout
AttributeType.description: HTML layout for generated markup. Possible values: "block" for generating an HTML <div> element, "inline" for generating an HTML <span> element, and "none" for generating no HTML element. There is a minor exception for the "none" case where a child element has the property "rendered" set to "false". In this case, we create an empty <span> element with same ID as the child element to use as a placeholder for later processing.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: viewId
AttributeType.description: viewId for included page.

ElementType.name: loadBundle
ElementType.description: Load a resource bundle localized for the Locale of the current view, and expose it (as a Map) in the request attributes of the current request. In difference of original f:loadBundle tag, stored in components tree and activate on ajax/non ajax responses

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: basename
AttributeType.description: Base name of the resource bundle to be loaded.

AttributeType.name: var
AttributeType.description: Name of a request scope attribute under which the resource bundle will be exposed as a Map.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: src
AttributeType.description: name of JavaScript resource to load.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: src
AttributeType.description: name of JavaScript resource to load.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

ElementType.name: log
ElementType.description: Encode javaScript to open popup window with client-side Log information.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: height
AttributeType.description: height of pop-up

AttributeType.name: level
AttributeType.description: log level, possible values : FATAL,ERROR,WARN,INFO,DEBUG,ALL. Component set level 'ALL' by default.

AttributeType.name: popup
AttributeType.description: Render log as popup-window or as div element in page

AttributeType.name: width
AttributeType.description: width of pop-up.

AttributeType.name: name
AttributeType.description: name of pop-up window

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: hotkey
AttributeType.description: Keyboard key for activate ( in combination with CTRL+SHIFT ) log window.

ElementType.name: mediaOutput
ElementType.description: Class for create any link-type elements to user-generated resources : images, sounds, video, active objects, applets etc. Method specified in "CreateContent" attribute will put the data from Data Bean specified in "value" attribute to the OutputStream. Important: Data Bean specified in "value" must implement Serializable.

AttributeType.name: uriAttribute
AttributeType.description: Name of attribute for resource-link attribute ( 'href' for <a>, 'src' for <img> or <script>, etc

AttributeType.name: type
AttributeType.description: The content type of the resource designated by this hyperlink

AttributeType.name: hreflang
AttributeType.description: Base language of a resource specified with the href attribute; hreflang may only be used with href

AttributeType.name: expires
AttributeType.description: expires

AttributeType.name: onblur
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code. The onblur event occurs when an element loses focus either by the pointing device or by tabbing navigation. It may be used with the same elements as onfocus

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: Data value calculated at render time and stored in URI (also as part of cache Key ), at generation time passed to send method. Can be used for update cache at change of generating conditions, and for creating beans as "Lightweight" pattern components (request scope). IMPORTANT: Since serialized data stored in URI, avoid using big objects.

AttributeType.name: border
AttributeType.description: Deprecated. This attribute specifies the width of an IMG or OBJECT border, in pixels. The default value for this attribute depends on the user agent

AttributeType.name: vspace
AttributeType.description: Deprecated. This attribute specifies the amount of white space to be inserted above and below an IMG, APPLET, or OBJECT. The default value is not specified, but is generally a small, non-zero length

AttributeType.name: mimeType
AttributeType.description: Geterated content mime-type for append to response header ( 'image/jpeg' etc )

AttributeType.name: element
AttributeType.description: Name of html element for resource link - may be <a> <img> <object> <applet> <script> or <link>

AttributeType.name: ondblclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

AttributeType.name: onmouseout
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

AttributeType.name: align
AttributeType.description:
bottom|middle|top|left|right Deprecated. This attribute specifies the position of an IMG, OBJECT, or APPLET with respect to its context.
The following values for align concern the object's position with respect to surrounding text:
* bottom: means that the bottom of the object should be vertically aligned with the current baseline. This is the default value. * middle: means that the center of the object should be vertically aligned with the current baseline. * top: means that the top of the object should be vertically aligned with the top of the current text line

AttributeType.name: charset
AttributeType.description: The character encoding of a resource designated by this hyperlink

AttributeType.name: onkeyup
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

AttributeType.name: onfocus
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code. The onfocus event occurs when an element gets focus.

AttributeType.name: shape
AttributeType.description:
default|rect|circle|poly [CI] This attribute specifies the shape of a region. Possible values:
* default: Specifies the entire region. * rect: Define a rectangular region. * circle: Define a circular region. * poly: Define a polygonal region.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: declare
AttributeType.description: declare but don't instantiate flag

AttributeType.name: standby
AttributeType.description: message to show while loading

AttributeType.name: session
AttributeType.description: session

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: onmousedown
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

AttributeType.name: cacheable
AttributeType.description: cacheable

AttributeType.name: rev
AttributeType.description: A reverse link from the anchor specified by this hyperlink to the current document. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

AttributeType.name: hspace
AttributeType.description: Deprecated. This attribute specifies the amount of white space to be inserted to the left and right of an IMG, APPLET, or OBJECT. The default value is not specified, but is generally a small, non-zero length

AttributeType.name: usemap
AttributeType.description: use client-side image map

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

AttributeType.name: accesskey
AttributeType.description: This attribute assigns an access key to an element. An access key is a single character from the document character set. Note: Authors should consider the input method of the expected reader when specifying an accesskey

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

AttributeType.name: ismap
AttributeType.description: use server-side image map

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

AttributeType.name: converter
AttributeType.description: converter

AttributeType.name: onmouseup
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

AttributeType.name: classid
AttributeType.description: identifies an implementation

AttributeType.name: codetype
AttributeType.description: content type for code

AttributeType.name: onmousemove
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

AttributeType.name: lastModified
AttributeType.description: lastModified

AttributeType.name: createContent
AttributeType.description: Method call expression to send generated resource to OutputStream. It must have two parameter with a type of java.io.OutputStream and java.lang.Object ( deserialized value of data attribute )

AttributeType.name: tabindex
AttributeType.description: This attribute specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767. User agents should ignore leading zeros

AttributeType.name: onkeydown
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

AttributeType.name: onkeypress
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

AttributeType.name: onmouseover
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

AttributeType.name: coords
AttributeType.description:
This attribute specifies the position and shape on the screen. The number and order of values depends on the shape being defined. Possible combinations:
* rect: left-x, top-y, right-x, bottom-y. * circle: center-x, center-y, radius. Note. When the radius value is percentage value, user agents should calculate the final radius value based on the associated object's width and height. The radius should be the smaller value of the two. * poly: x1, y1, x2, y2, ..., xN, yN. The first x and y coordinate pair and the last should be the same to close the polygon. When these coordinate values are not the same, user agents should infer an additional coordinate pair to close the polygon.
Coordinates are relative to the top, left corner of the object. All values are lengths. All values are separated by commas

AttributeType.name: target
AttributeType.description:
This attribute specifies the name of a frame where a document is to be opened.
By assigning a name to a frame via the name attribute, authors can refer to it as the "target" of links defined by other elements

AttributeType.name: onclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

AttributeType.name: rel
AttributeType.description: The relationship from the current document to the anchor specified by this hyperlink. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

AttributeType.name: archive
AttributeType.description: space-separated list of URIs

AttributeType.name: codebase
AttributeType.description: base URI for classid, data, archive

ElementType.name: outputPanel
ElementType.description: Creates an AJAX-enabled part of the page. For a normal request, render a &lt;span&gt; or &lt;div&gt; HTML element depending on the value of the "layout" attribute, "inline" or "block". (The "id" attribute will be the value of the clientId property.) For an AJAX request, the content of this element is included in the response if the value of the property, "ajaxRendered", is set to true.

AttributeType.name: onmousemove
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

AttributeType.name: ondblclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

AttributeType.name: onmouseout
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

AttributeType.name: onkeyup
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

AttributeType.name: ajaxRendered
AttributeType.description: Defines, whether the content of this component must be (or not) included in AJAX response created by parent AJAX Container, even if it is not forced by reRender list of ajax action. Ignored if component marked to output by Ajax action. default false

AttributeType.name: onkeydown
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

AttributeType.name: onkeypress
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: keepTransient
AttributeType.description: Flag for mark all child components to non-transient. If true, all children components will be set to non-transient state and keep in saved components tree. For output in self-renderer region all content ( By default, all content in <f:verbatim> tags and non-jsf elements in facelets, marked as transient - since, self-rendered ajax regions don't plain output for ajax processing ).

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

AttributeType.name: onmouseover
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

AttributeType.name: onmouseup
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

AttributeType.name: layout
AttributeType.description: HTML layout for generated markup. Possible values: "block" for generating an HTML <div> element, "inline" for generating an HTML <span> element, and "none" for generating no HTML element. There is a minor exception for the "none" case where a child element has the property "rendered" set to "false". In this case, we create an empty <span> element with same ID as the child element to use as a placeholder for later processing.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: onclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

AttributeType.name: onmousedown
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

ElementType.name: page
ElementType.description:
This component renders a full HTML page structure. It must be the first (and only) child for the view root (JSP <f:view> tag). No HTML code can be outside of this component. It also has support for processing child components in AJAX requests, just like <a4j:region>. For a normal request, it will render the results of a <script> element with a client-side library at the page's <head>. If this component includes a "head" facet, the facet's content will also be rendered at the <head> element. For an AJAX request, only affected components in the full document structure will be rendered.
Here's an example of using it in JSP (jspx version): <jsp:root xmlns:.... <f:view> <a4j:page><f:facet name="head"> ... </f:facet> <!-- page content here --> </a4j:page> </f:view></jsp:root>

AttributeType.name: onunload
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code to execute on a page unload.

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

AttributeType.name: contentType
AttributeType.description: Set custom mime content type to response

AttributeType.name: format
AttributeType.description: Page layout format ( html, xhtml, html-transitional, html-3.2 ) for encoding DOCTYPE, namespace and Content-Type definitions

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

AttributeType.name: namespace
AttributeType.description: Set html element default namespace

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: Flag indicating that, if this component is activated by ajaxrequest, notifications should be delivered to interested listeners and actions immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase) rather than waiting until Invoke Application phase.

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

AttributeType.name: selfRendered
AttributeType.description: if 'true' , self-render subtree at InvokeApplication ( or Decode, if immediate property set to true ) phase

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

AttributeType.name: onload
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code to execute on a page load.

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

AttributeType.name: pageTitle
AttributeType.description: String for output as a page title.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: ajaxListener
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding representing an action listener method that will be notified when this component is activated by the ajax Request and handle it. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes an AjaxEvent parameter, with a return type of void.

ElementType.name: poll
ElementType.description: Periodically perform AJAX request to server, to simulate 'poll' data.

AttributeType.name: actionListener
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

AttributeType.name: reRender
AttributeType.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: interval
AttributeType.description: Interval (in ms) for call poll requests. Default value 1000 (1 sec)

AttributeType.name: ajaxSingle
AttributeType.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

AttributeType.name: data
AttributeType.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

AttributeType.name: eventsQueue
AttributeType.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: action
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

AttributeType.name: focus
AttributeType.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: enabled
AttributeType.description: Enable/disable polling

AttributeType.name: ignoreDupResponses
AttributeType.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event.

AttributeType.name: status
AttributeType.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

AttributeType.name: bypassUpdates
AttributeType.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

AttributeType.name: oncomplete
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: onsubmit
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call before submission of ajax event

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

AttributeType.name: limitToList
AttributeType.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: timeout
AttributeType.description: Timeout (in ms) for request

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

ElementType.name: region
ElementType.description: This tag defines a part of the JSF Tree that is to be decoded on the server side during AJAX request processing

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: Flag indicating that, if this component is activated by ajaxrequest, notifications should be delivered to interested listeners and actions immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase) rather than waiting until Invoke Application phase.

AttributeType.name: renderRegionOnly
AttributeType.description: Flag to disable rendering in AJAX responses content outside of active region. If this attribute set to "true" , no one of the components outside of region will be included to AJAX response. If set to "false", search for components to include in response will be performed on all tree. Default "true"

AttributeType.name: selfRendered
AttributeType.description: if 'true' , self-render subtree at InvokeApplication ( or Decode, if immediate property set to true ) phase

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: ajaxListener
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding representing an action listener method that will be notified when this component is activated by the ajax Request and handle it. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes an AjaxEvent parameter, with a return type of void.

AttributeType.name: stateVar
AttributeType.description: stateVar

AttributeType.name: var
AttributeType.description: A request-scope attribute under which the data object for the current row is exposed when iterating

AttributeType.name: rowKey
AttributeType.description: rowKey

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: rendered

AttributeType.name: rows
AttributeType.description: A number of rows to display, or zero for all remaining rows in the table

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: id

AttributeType.name: ajaxKeys
AttributeType.description: ajaxKeys

AttributeType.name: rowKeyVar
AttributeType.description: rowKeyVar

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: value

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: binding

AttributeType.name: first
AttributeType.description: A zero-relative row number of the first row to display

AttributeType.name: componentState
AttributeType.description: componentState

ElementType.name: status
ElementType.description: Renders area for indicating Ajax request status on the client-side. <br /> During Encoding: Creates two "span" elements with id created as clientId of this component or of target AJAX region (pointed to by the "for" property) with appended ":status.start" and ":status:stop" strings. <br /> "start" span has "display:none" style (hidden). Inside this span, renders the value of the startText/stopText properties or, if they exist, the content of "start" and "stop" facets. <br /> On performing an AJAX request, the client-side script changes the visibility of the "start" span and hides "stop". After all requests for this indicator are completed, restores "stop" and hide "start" start[style,styleClass] and stop[style,styleClass] are rendered for spans as style and class atributes, respectivetly. <br /> During Encoding: Creates two "span" or "div"(depending on 'layout' attribute) elements with id created as clientId of this component or of target AJAX region (pointed to by the "for" property) with appended ":status.start" and ":status:stop" strings. "start" element has "display:none" style (hidden). Inside this element, renders the value of the startText/stopText properties or, if they exist, the content of "start" and "stop" facets. On performing an AJAX request, the client-side script changes the visibility of the "start" element and hides "stop". After all requests for this indicator are completed, restores "stop" and hide "start" <br /> start[style,styleClass] and stop[style,styleClass] are rendered for spans as style and class atributes, respectivetly.

AttributeType.name: onstop
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code, called on the stop of a request.

AttributeType.name: onstart
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code, called on the start of a request.

AttributeType.name: startStyle
AttributeType.description: CSS style class for the element displayed on the start of a request.

AttributeType.name: for
AttributeType.description: ID of the AjaxContainer component whose status is indicated (in the format of a javax.faces.UIComopnent.findComponent() call).

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

AttributeType.name: stopText

AttributeType.description: If true, render the ID of the component in HTML code without JSF modifications.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

AttributeType.name: layout

AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

AttributeType.name: startStyleClass
AttributeType.description: CSS style class for the element displayed on the start of a request.

AttributeType.name: onmouseover
AttributeType.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

AttributeType.name: onclick

ElementType.name: support
ElementType.description:
Adds the AJAX functionality for those UIComponent-based componenent that have properties for JavaScript events.
During Decoding: If a request is Ajax-performed, obtains the Map from the "requestParameterMap" property of the ExternalContext. If this Map contains non null value for the "clientId" key, creates a javax.faces.event.ActionEvent around the component, passes it to the queueEvent() method of the component, and then appends it's reRender components IDs to a list of rendered areas.
During Encoding. Doesn't encode as a component. Instead, it adds ValueBinding for a property of the parent component with the name as a value of its "event" property. As a result, when rendered, the parent component builds JavaScript code for submitting an AJAX request on this event.
If the component has child UIParameter components, appends it's name/value as additional request parameters.
If a parent component is an instance of UIInput and the ajaxType property is "input", submits the value of the input field, also. In this case, you can submit a single input field outside of UIForm.

AttributeType.name: actionListener
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

AttributeType.name: reRender
AttributeType.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: ajaxSingle
AttributeType.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

AttributeType.name: disableDefault
AttributeType.description: Disable default action for target event ( append "return false;" to javascript )

AttributeType.name: data
AttributeType.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

AttributeType.name: eventsQueue
AttributeType.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

AttributeType.name: parentProperties
AttributeType.description: parentProperties

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

AttributeType.name: event
AttributeType.description: Name of JavaScript event property ( onclick, onchange, etc.) of parent component, for which we will build AJAX submission code

AttributeType.name: action
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

AttributeType.name: focus
AttributeType.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: requestDelay
AttributeType.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

AttributeType.name: ignoreDupResponses
AttributeType.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event

AttributeType.name: status
AttributeType.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

AttributeType.name: bypassUpdates
AttributeType.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

AttributeType.name: oncomplete
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

AttributeType.name: onsubmit
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call before submission of ajax event

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

AttributeType.name: limitToList
AttributeType.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

AttributeType.name: timeout
AttributeType.description: Timeout (in ms) for request
